required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: International Alfapump Cohort Study: in Patients With Refractory Ascites Due to Liver Cirrhosis or Malignant Ascites With a Life Expectancy of 6 Months or Less

brief_summary.textblock: This Registry is designed to follow patients who have been implanted with an alfapump system, which is a newly marketed product from Sequana Medical AG, a Swiss Medical Device company.

detailed_description.textblock: In a real-world setting, all patients implanted with an alfapump system according to it's intended use, not participating in another clinical study in which the alfapump is studied.

primary_outcome.measure: Patient survival at 6 months post implant
primary_outcome.description: The primary outcome will be patient survival with a functional alfapump system at 6 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess occurrence of (major) reportable events.
secondary_outcome.description: Reportable events are defined as any events per the definition in 9.1 and classified as renal event, variceal bleeding, hepatic encephalopathy an infection or assessed as related (not classified "improbable related" or "cannot be attributed" per the definitions below) to; the implant procedure, device or therapy by the treating physician.

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess safety at 1-month post implant for procedure related incidents.
secondary_outcome.description: o Occurrence of adverse events considered related to implant, product or therapy by the treating physician

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical impact on liver and renal function in liver & renal blood lab panel
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical impact as assessed by changes in Prealbumin

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical impact on liver and renal function in liver & renal blood lab panel
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical impact as assessed by changes in Albumin.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical impact on liver and renal function in liver & renal blood lab panel
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical impact as assessed by changes in eGFR.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical impact on liver and renal function in liver & renal blood lab panel
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical impact as assessed by changes in createnine.

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life
secondary_outcome.description: Ascites Questionnaire (pre implant & at each visit after the first month post implant)

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life
secondary_outcome.description: SF-36 (pre implant at each visit after the first month post implant)

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life on patient activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks-, 8 weeks-, 16 weeks-, 24 weeks- and 48 weeks post implant
secondary_outcome.description: Assess change in physical activity pre- and post implant To assess daily activity and stress level of patients for up to 48 weeks following implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life on patient activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks-, 8 weeks-, 16 weeks-, 24 weeks- and 48 weeks post implant
secondary_outcome.description: Assess change in physical activity pre- and post implant To assess and evaluate sleep of patients for up to 48 weeks following implant

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life on patient activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks-, 8 weeks-, 16 weeks-, 24 weeks- and 48 weeks post implant
secondary_outcome.description: Assess change in physical activity pre- and post implant To assess daily activity and stress level of patients for up to 48 weeks following implant To assess and evaluate sleep of patients for up to 48 weeks following implant To assess patient's abdominal pain/discomfort, appetite, satiety, and tiredness To assess objective stress and inflammation parameters

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life on patient activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks-, 8 weeks-, 16 weeks-, 24 weeks- and 48 weeks post implant
secondary_outcome.description: Assess change in physical activity pre- and post implant To assess patient's abdominal pain/discomfort, appetite, satiety, and tiredness

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of the alfapump on ascites symptoms related quality of life on patient activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks-, 8 weeks-, 16 weeks-, 24 weeks- and 48 weeks post implant
secondary_outcome.description: Assess change in physical activity pre- and post implant To assess objective stress and inflammation parameters
change in ECOG performance scale pre- and post implant

biospec_descr.textblock: Biobanking of urine, ascites and serum

study_pop.textblock: The TOPMOST will target to include, in a real-world setting, all patients implanted with an alfapump system as per intended use, not participating in another clinical study in which the alfapump is being evaluated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients implanted with an alfapump are eligible for this registry
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients younger than 18 years
- Pregnancy
- Inability to operate the Smart Charger to recharge the alfapump
- Participating in another study in which the alfapump is studied
